MEMORY LOSS THAT DISRUPTS DAILY LIFE MAY BE A SYMPTOM OF ALZHEIMER'S OR OTHER DEMENTIA. SOME OF THE MAIN

FS

WARNING SIGNS AND SYMPTOMS TO KEEP AN EYE OUT FOR INCLUDE--

- CHALLENGES IN PLANNING OR SOLVING PROBLEMS.

- DIFFICULTY COMPLETING FAMILIAR TASKS.

- CONFUSION WITH TIME OR PLACE

- NEW PROBLEMS WITH WORDS IN SPEAKING OR WRITING.

- WITHDRAWAL FROM WORK OR SOCIAL ACTIVITIES

AND CHANGES IN MOOD AND PERSONALITY.

(2) AMANDA

THE ALZHEIMER'S ASSOCIATION GREATER INDIANA CHAPTER IS OFFERING A FREE VIRTUAL RESOURCE FAIR TOMORROW FROM NOON TO 4:30.

YOU CAN LEARN MORE AT WRTV DOT COM.

IGNITE.MOPWRTVWRTV/SHOW.MIDDAY.RUNDOWN375743298P-ALZHEIMER'S202STORYFORM16656342:012cc828:5f891101Xpc-mh202asP-ALZHEIMER'SAS*PKG0209209bmenendezG201015K261OFFLINE1602818305tbrozOKSOT,LP,WALLOVERLAY1602818305PKGbannerPIECING TOGETHER THE LIFE THEY HAVE SHARED - AFTER 50 YEARS OF MARRIAGE - YOU LEARN A THING OR TWO.The magic words, "yes dear."clear L3NOW MARSHA AND TERRY HOWELL ARE PUTTING TOGETHER AN ENTIRELY NEW PUZZLE PRESENTED TO THEM. I guess when you first get married, you don't think there will ever be these kinds of things that you have to work through together. And so you don't anticipate that you have to be such a strong partner. SHORTLY AFTER RETIRING FIVE YEARS AGO - MARSHA NOTICED SOMETHING DIFFERENT ABOUT HER HUSBAND.SOT - Marsha Howell @ :42I started to recognizing the changes and the cognition. And everybody kept telling me it is the normal aging and I kept saying I don't think it is.clear L3WITH NO FAMIILY HISTORY, TERRY WAS DIAGNOSED WITH LEWY BODY DEMENTIA. SOT - Terry Howell @ :59There are times, if I were her, I would not be very happy. Because she never belittles, she never lets me know that she must be frustrated. clear L3WHILE MARSHA HAS REMAINED POSITIVE - THE PROCESS IS NOT EASY.There have been some times that I have had just total meltdowns and it's those times that I have really needed the assistance of somebody else to talk to and just to say, you know, help me through this. THE EXTRA HAND SHE NEEDED CAME FROM A CALL TO THE ALZHEIMER'S ASSOCIATION GREATER INDIANA CHAPTER They will help you the way no one else does. He started doing the hallucentations and things like that and it was to a point that it was just beyond anything I have ever dealt with. And so when I reached out for help, all of a sudden, I was like I am not alone. FOR MARSHA, IT BROKE DOWN BARRRIERS SHE WAS DEALING WITH - AND IT OPENED RESOURCES TO HELP HER AND TERRY COPE AND MOVE FORWARD TOGETHER. SOT - Stephanie Laskey @ 2:15The earlier that we can get a diagnosis of any type of dementia, whether it be Lewy body or whatever it is. The, I can't say better the better a prognosis, because we don't have a cure, but a better quality of life and the better that individual can be with planning that quality of life. clear L3THE ORGANIZATION OFFERS RESOURCES FOR INDIANA FAMILIES NAVIGATING THE EARLY STAGES OF ALZHEIMER'S AND DEMENTIA. Trying to figure out what, when I guess behavior is. Is this my normally or is this something else that I need to pay more attention to. It is more the unkown. I keep saying, I wake up in the morning, same as always. So keep picking off a day at a time. FOR TERRY - IT GIVES HIM A COMMUNITY OF PEOPLE THAT UNDERSTAND WHAT HE IS GOING THROUGH. AND MARSHA CAN CONNECT WITH CAREGIVERS WHO ARE ALSO PARTNERS. IT'S AN ABUNDANCE OF RESOURCES AVAILABLE TO HELP HOOSIER FAMILIES ON WHAT IS A DIFFICULT JOURNEY, NOT WALK IT ALONE.You can make it what you want it to be. If you want to make it contentious and if you want to make it somethign that everybody is fearful of, or is afraid of. But it is so much better to celebrate it. Celebrate what they are becoming now and go through it as a family together. TRT= 3:29OC= a family together.]] S3.0 G 0 [[TAKE SOTSOURCE/CLIP: prodsan\News\2020\10 Oct\15\rebound -Alzheimers - packageTIMECODE:BITE SOURCE:RUNS=]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 1 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033481] (_L3 1-Line Banner) | Blue | The Rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Navigating a dementia diagnosis]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 12 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 10 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033483] (_L3 2-Line Banner) | Blue | the rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Marsha Howell | Husband has dementia]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 13 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 6 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033484] (_L3 2-Line Banner) | Blue | the rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Terry Howell | Has lewy body dementia]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 14 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 8 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033485] (_L3 2-Line Banner) | Blue | the rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Stephanie Laskey | Alzheimer's Association Greater Indiana Chapter]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 15 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)WRTVCAMWRTVSCRIPPS 2019 WRTV\00033481[00033481] (_L3 1-Line Banner) | Blue | The Rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Navigating a dementia diagnosisChymox.AssetBrowser.1[00033481] (_L3 1-Line Banner) | Blue | The Rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Navigating a dementia diagnosisAhttp://10.38.10.72/thumbs/SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV/33000/Objects_SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV_00033481_proxy.pnghttp://10.38.10.72/thumbs/SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV/33000/Objects_SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV_00033481_big.jpgPLAYLISThttp://ncsA4.com/mos/supported_schemas/NCSAXML2.08astarrantinoprime-graphicsI:\CAMIO4\SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV\Scenes\_L3 1-Line Banner.crdWRTVCAMhttp://10.38.10.72/CAMIO4/Services/Redirection/MosRedirectionService.svc1

IGNITE.MOPWRTVWRTV/SHOW.MIDDAY.RUNDOWN375743298P-ALZHEIMER'S302STORYFORM16656342:012cd15a:5f8996efXpc-mh302asP-ALZHEIMER'SAS*PKG0209209RSteeleG201015K261ONLINE1602852591rsteeleOKSOT,LP,WALLOVERLAY1602818305PKGbannerPIECING TOGETHER THE LIFE THEY HAVE SHARED - AFTER 50 YEARS OF MARRIAGE - YOU LEARN A THING OR TWO.The magic words, "yes dear."clear L3NOW MARSHA AND TERRY HOWELL ARE PUTTING TOGETHER AN ENTIRELY NEW PUZZLE PRESENTED TO THEM. I guess when you first get married, you don't think there will ever be these kinds of things that you have to work through together. And so you don't anticipate that you have to be such a strong partner. SHORTLY AFTER RETIRING FIVE YEARS AGO - MARSHA NOTICED SOMETHING DIFFERENT ABOUT HER HUSBAND.SOT - Marsha Howell @ :42I started to recognizing the changes and the cognition. And everybody kept telling me it is the normal aging and I kept saying I don't think it is.clear L3WITH NO FAMIILY HISTORY, TERRY WAS DIAGNOSED WITH LEWY BODY DEMENTIA. SOT - Terry Howell @ :59There are times, if I were her, I would not be very happy. Because she never belittles, she never lets me know that she must be frustrated. clear L3WHILE MARSHA HAS REMAINED POSITIVE - THE PROCESS IS NOT EASY.There have been some times that I have had just total meltdowns and it's those times that I have really needed the assistance of somebody else to talk to and just to say, you know, help me through this. THE EXTRA HAND SHE NEEDED CAME FROM A CALL TO THE ALZHEIMER'S ASSOCIATION GREATER INDIANA CHAPTER They will help you the way no one else does. He started doing the hallucentations and things like that and it was to a point that it was just beyond anything I have ever dealt with. And so when I reached out for help, all of a sudden, I was like I am not alone. FOR MARSHA, IT BROKE DOWN BARRRIERS SHE WAS DEALING WITH - AND IT OPENED RESOURCES TO HELP HER AND TERRY COPE AND MOVE FORWARD TOGETHER. SOT - Stephanie Laskey @ 2:15The earlier that we can get a diagnosis of any type of dementia, whether it be Lewy body or whatever it is. The, I can't say better the better a prognosis, because we don't have a cure, but a better quality of life and the better that individual can be with planning that quality of life. clear L3THE ORGANIZATION OFFERS RESOURCES FOR INDIANA FAMILIES NAVIGATING THE EARLY STAGES OF ALZHEIMER'S AND DEMENTIA. Trying to figure out what, when I guess behavior is. Is this my normally or is this something else that I need to pay more attention to. It is more the unkown. I keep saying, I wake up in the morning, same as always. So keep picking off a day at a time. FOR TERRY - IT GIVES HIM A COMMUNITY OF PEOPLE THAT UNDERSTAND WHAT HE IS GOING THROUGH. AND MARSHA CAN CONNECT WITH CAREGIVERS WHO ARE ALSO PARTNERS. IT'S AN ABUNDANCE OF RESOURCES AVAILABLE TO HELP HOOSIER FAMILIES ON WHAT IS A DIFFICULT JOURNEY, NOT WALK IT ALONE.You can make it what you want it to be. If you want to make it contentious and if you want to make it somethign that everybody is fearful of, or is afraid of. But it is so much better to celebrate it. Celebrate what they are becoming now and go through it as a family together. TRT= 3:29OC= a family together.]] S3.0 G 0 [[TAKE SOTSOURCE/CLIP: prodsan\News\2020\10 Oct\15\rebound -Alzheimers - packageTIMECODE:BITE SOURCE:RUNS=]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 1 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033481] (_L3 1-Line Banner) | Blue | The Rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Navigating a dementia diagnosis]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 12 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 10 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033483] (_L3 2-Line Banner) | Blue | the rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Marsha Howell | Husband has dementia]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 13 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 6 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033484] (_L3 2-Line Banner) | Blue | the rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Terry Howell | Has lewy body dementia]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 14 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 8 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00033485] (_L3 2-Line Banner) | Blue | the rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Stephanie Laskey | Alzheimer's Association Greater Indiana Chapter]] S3.0 M 0 [[MOSCG ]] 15 YNNAM 0 [[ [A] [00013153] (Clear L3)WRTVCAMWRTVSCRIPPS 2019 WRTV\00033481[00033481] (_L3 1-Line Banner) | Blue | The Rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Navigating a dementia diagnosisChymox.AssetBrowser.1[00033481] (_L3 1-Line Banner) | Blue | The Rebound | indiana | OFF | OFF | OFF | Navigating a dementia diagnosisAhttp://10.38.10.72/thumbs/SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV/33000/Objects_SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV_00033481_proxy.pnghttp://10.38.10.72/thumbs/SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV/33000/Objects_SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV_00033481_big.jpgPLAYLISThttp://ncsA4.com/mos/supported_schemas/NCSAXML2.08astarrantinoprime-graphicsI:\CAMIO4\SCRIPPS 2019 WRTV\Scenes\_L3 1-Line Banner.crdWRTVCAMhttp://10.38.10.72/CAMIO4/Services/Redirection/MosRedirectionService.svc1

- DIFFICULTY COMPLETING FAMILIAR TASKS.

- CONFUSION WITH TIME OR PLACE
